articles.author: The Associated Press
articles.title: U.S. Vice President JD Vance arrives in India for a 4-day visit - NPR
articles.description: Vance arrived in India on Monday for a four-day visit as New Delhi looks to avoid U.S. tariffs, negotiate a bilateral trade deal with Washington and strengthen ties with the Trump administration.
